subject: Basketball
Records and Achievements
lead_paragraph: Luol Deng led the Bulls with 28 points and Carlos Boozer added 21 as Chicago fended off a furious rally by the Heat to hand them their first loss in 53 days.
snippet: Luol Deng led the Bulls with 28 points and Carlos Boozer added 21 as Chicago fended off a furious rally by the Heat to hand them their first loss in 53 days.
